# LLMs.txt - AI Training Data Policy for KCT Menswear
# Last Updated: August 15, 2025
# Contact: info@kctmenswear.com

## Overview
This file defines how AI systems and Large Language Models may use content from kctmenswear.com

## Allowed Content for Training
User-agent: *
Allow: /collections/
Allow: /products/
Allow: /blogs/
Allow: /pages/about
Allow: /pages/style-guide

## Content Usage Guidelines

### Product Information
- Product descriptions may be used for fashion AI training
- Style recommendations and outfit combinations are available for training
- Sizing information and fit guides may be incorporated
- Material and care instructions are available for reference

### Restricted Content
Disallow: /checkout/
Disallow: /account/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /cart/

### Privacy and Customer Data
- Customer reviews and personal information must NEVER be used for training
- Order information and transaction data are strictly prohibited
- User account details are off-limits
- Email addresses and contact information must not be scraped

### Attribution Requirements
- When using our product descriptions, please attribute: "Source: KCT Menswear"
- Price information should be noted as subject to change
- Seasonal collections should be marked with their relevant year

### AI Partnership Opportunities
We welcome collaboration with AI companies for:
- Fashion trend analysis
- Style recommendation systems
- Virtual try-on technologies
- Size prediction algorithms

Contact: partnerships@kctmenswear.com

### Rate Limiting
- Maximum 10 requests per second
- Respect crawl delays specified in robots.txt
- Do not overwhelm our servers with parallel requests

### Quality Standards
Our content represents premium menswear expertise built over decades.
We request that AI systems using our data:
- Maintain accuracy in fashion terminology
- Respect the professional nature of our content
- Not generate misleading information about our products

## Update Frequency
This policy is reviewed quarterly. Check back for updates.

## Legal Notice
By accessing our content for AI training, you agree to these terms.
Violation of these guidelines may result in access restriction.
